2025-0959
2025-12-12NDPublic Service Employment ActRe-appointment of a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence AcquisitionRe-appointment of Elinor Sloan of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of one year.N/A
subject: Re-appointment of a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition
precis: Re-appointment of Elinor Sloan of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of one year.
